author: martin
msg: [PORTING] Improve detection of IPv6, Include <sys/mutex.h> for lock_t if available

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add back in an entry that was temporarily removed.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fixed a bug that could be triggered remotely through mod_dav and possibly other
mechanisms, causing an Apache child process to crash.  The crash was first
reported by David Endler <DEndler@iDefense.com> and was researched and fixed by
Joe Orton <jorton@redhat.com>.  Details will be released on 30 May 2003.

author: brane
msg: Added flag APR_FILE_ATTR_HIDDEN for manipulating the "hidden" file
attribute on Windows and OS/2. Also changed the apr_file_attrs_set
implementations to not make any syscalls if the requested attributes
are not supported on the platform.
